name: Resttolandia
description:
Welcome to Resttolandia, where you don't just play as a gamer, you become the streamer! Get ready to navigate through a challenging world of platforms, pitfalls, and pixel-perfect jumps as you aim to reach the ultimate streaming stardom.

In Resttolandia, you'll take control of streamer, equipped with determination to conquer every obstacle in your path. Inspired by the cult classic Jump King, this game puts a unique twist on the genre by immersing you in the thrilling world of online streaming.

But beware, as a streamer, every move you make is broadcasted live to your audience. Will you gracefully navigate through each level with finesse, earning the admiration of your viewers? Or will you succumb to the pressure and entertain them with your epic fails?

Key Features


Experience the adrenaline rush of platforming action with a twist as you play the role of a streamer.
Test your reflexes and precision in challenging levels filled with traps, jumps, and secrets.
Interact with your virtual audience as you climb higher and higher, earning their cheers or jeers based on your performance.
Earn or give subs on stream based on your gameplay.
